duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct daily inventory management processes for supplies, linen, and equipment throughout the Medical Center and maintain related records.
Supply the clinical enterprises with the supplies they need in the right place and quantity.
Participate in the orientation and training of other personnel.
Pick up soiled supplies, linen, and equipment, clean, disinfect, and store equipment.
Assemble, deliver, and pick up oxygen tanks and assist the dispatch function.
Follow hospital infection prevention policies and procedures, and maintain a professional work environment.
Maintain accurate and legible records of transfer of accountability and maintain supply and linen carts in a neat, clean, and orderly fashion.
Make minor repairs to equipment, manage information utilizing appropriate manual or electronic systems, and participate in the orientation and training of other personnel.
Perform patient and supply transport functions, daily inventory of supplies, linen, and equipment, and pick up charges and batches them for transmittal to Data Processing.

Receive and process phone orders for supplies, linen and/or equipment, receive, check in, and store supply and linen shipments, and issue Lab Coats and Surgical scrubs clothes to authorized personnel.

Respond to patient and non-patient emergencies, perform necessary housekeeping tasks to ensure neat and clean linen and supply storage areas, and observe regulations regarding the transport and handling of clean/soiled linens and supplies throughout the Medical Center.
Seek resources for direction when necessary.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent
